meanings.definition: Kibbes (noun): plural of kibbe, a Middle Eastern dish made of bulgur, minced onions, and ground meat
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the delicious kibbes at the Middle Eastern restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best kibbes for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The kibbes were so tasty that they disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly cooked kibbes filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: I can never resist the savory kibbes my grandma makes.

meanings.definition: Kibbes (verb): third person singular present of kibbe, to make or eat kibbe
meanings.sent1: He kibbes his favorite dish every weekend.
meanings.sent2: She kibbes kibbe with great skill and passion.
meanings.sent3: Do you think he kibbes kibbe better than anyone else?
meanings.sent4: Her love for kibbing kibbes is unmatched.
meanings.sent5: Kibbing kibbes brings joy to his heart.
